title: Beautiful Dictionary
content:
Recently stumbled upon [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018214353/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/marinachaccur/408088553/in/set-72157594566017239/).

Anyone know of a typographically mindful, aesthetically pleasing modern American English dictionary? **Clue:** Don't bother looking on Amazon...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018214353im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dic1_5927.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018214353im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dic2_5916.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018214353im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dic3_5089.png)
author: microspective

comments.content: That is beautiful. The clue does not help :) What dictionary is that?

Peaceful, isn't it?

First: Good Food.  
Then: Wine.  
Next: Whatever.

That is lovely.

Not a dictionary, but the [Chicago Manual of Style](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018214353/http:/www.chicagomanualofstyle.org/books.html) set in Scala and Scala Sans is very nicely done. Wish they had some images of the interior. I'll have to take some when I get back to the office.

_@D.R._ What?!

_@Stewf_ That would be very much appreciated. It's on my (rather long) list of books to get. Photographed copy just may move that book up the list...
